name: Applied Identities
tagline: The architecture of what comes next.
description: Applied Identities helps growth-market companies build the strategic identity layer that makes AI systems reason and act as authentic extensions of the organization.

frameworks.name: Compiled Corporation
frameworks.description: The shift from 'interpreted' operations — where humans translate strategy at runtime — to 'compiled' operations where business logic executes directly through agent workflows. Strategy encoded, not just communicated.

frameworks.name: Janus Brands
frameworks.description: Commercial identity that works for two audiences simultaneously: human customers who choose through emotion and experience, and AI agents that evaluate through structured data and parseable attributes.

frameworks.name: Decision Surfaces
frameworks.description: The boundary architecture between human judgment and algorithmic execution — where delegation happens, how scope is defined, and what triggers human re-engagement. Designed intentionally, not left to emerge.
